name: Pink Lady
description: The Pink Lady is built on a foundation of gin, with lemon juice for tartness and egg white for body, along with a note of grenadine to both sweeten and color the drink. But the Pink Lady needs additional fortification, and that's where a mild dose of applejack comes in; this lends more depth and backbone to the drink, and makes it about as unassuming as the brick that file clerk is packing around in her purse.
recipeIngredient: 1 egg white (will suffice for two drinks)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake very hard, without ice, for at least 10 seconds, to help emulsify the egg white. Fill shaker with ice and shake again for at least 10 seconds, then strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, if you dare.
